Package org.reldb.wrapd.tuples

Class TupleTypeGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.reldb.wrapd.tuples.TupleTypeGenerator
public class TupleTypeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
Generates Java code to represent a tuple, which is a class that implements Tuple.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    TupleTypeGenerator​(java.lang.String dir, java.lang.String packageSpec, java.lang.String tupleName)
    Create a generator of compiled Tuple-derived classes, which can be used to conveniently receive SELECT query results and generate INSERT and UPDATE queries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addAttribute​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Class<?> type)
    Add the specified attribute of specified type.
    JavaCompiler.CompilationResults compile()
    Compile this tuple type as a class.
    boolean destroy()
    Delete this tuple type before loading it.
    static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.reflect.Field> getDataFields​(java.lang.Class<?> tupleClass)
    Given a Class used as a tuple type, return a stream of fields suitable for data.
    java.lang.String getTupleClassName()
    Return the class name of the tuple.
    java.lang.Class<?> typeOf​(java.lang.String name)
    Return the type of an attribute with a given name.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • TupleTypeGenerator

      public TupleTypeGenerator​(java.lang.String dir, java.lang.String packageSpec, java.lang.String tupleName)
      Create a generator of compiled Tuple-derived classes, which can be used to conveniently receive SELECT query results and generate INSERT and UPDATE queries.
      Parameters:
      dir - Directory into which generated class(es) will be put.
      packageSpec - The package, in dotted notation, to which the Tuple belongs.
      tupleName - Name of generated tuple class.

  • Method Details

    • getDataFields

      public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.reflect.Field> getDataFields​(java.lang.Class<?> tupleClass)
      Given a Class used as a tuple type, return a stream of fields suitable for data. Exclude static fields, metadata, etc.
      Parameters:
      tupleClass - Class<?> tuple type.
      Returns:
      Stream<Field> of FieldS.

    • destroy

      public boolean destroy()
      Delete this tuple type before loading it.
      Returns:
      True if source code and class have been successfully deleted.

    • typeOf

      public java.lang.Class<?> typeOf​(java.lang.String name)
      Return the type of an attribute with a given name.
      Parameters:
      name - Attribute name.
      Returns:
      Class<?> type of attribute or null if not found.

    • addAttribute

      public void addAttribute​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Class<?> type)
      Add the specified attribute of specified type. NOTE: Will not take effect until compile() has been invoked.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of new attribute.
      type - Type (class) of new attribute.

    • compile

      public JavaCompiler.CompilationResults compile()
      Compile this tuple type as a class.
      Returns:
      Compilation results.

    • getTupleClassName

      public java.lang.String getTupleClassName()
      Return the class name of the tuple.
      Returns:
      Class name.
